title: Add third product with e-commerce functionality

requirements.text: Add a third product to the product showcase featuring the white/light blue wireless earbuds from the uploaded image with MRP ₹499

quotes: Add this product and MRP is ₹499

acceptanceCriteria: Product card displays the white/light blue wireless earbuds image
Product appears in the product showcase section alongside existing earbuds and smartwatch

requirements.text: Create backend data model for products with fields: id, name, description, image path, MRP, features array, and availability status
acceptanceCriteria: Motoko type definition for Product includes all required fields
Backend provides query method to retrieve all products

requirements.text: Implement cash on delivery checkout system with delivery charge of ₹50

quotes: Check out only cash on delivery

acceptanceCriteria: Each product card includes a 'Cash on Delivery' checkout button
Checkout flow clearly displays product MRP + ₹50 delivery charge as total
Checkout only accepts Cash on Delivery payment method
Order confirmation includes delivery charge breakdown

requirements.text: Create order management system in backend to store customer orders with product details, delivery address, phone number, and order status

quotes: Check out only cash on delivery

acceptanceCriteria: Backend stores orders with all required fields
Each order includes product ID, customer details, total amount, delivery charge, and timestamp
Backend provides methods to create new orders and retrieve order history

requirements.text: Fetch and display product listings from backend on the product showcase section
acceptanceCriteria: Frontend queries backend for product list using React Query
Product showcase section dynamically renders ProductCard components from backend data
Loading and error states are handled appropriately

requirements.text: Render the uploaded white/light blue wireless earbuds product image as a static asset from frontend/public/assets/generated directory
acceptanceCriteria: Generated product image is saved in frontend/public/assets/generated/
Product card references the generated image file correctly
Image displays with appropriate dimensions and quality

constraints: Only Cash on Delivery payment method is allowed
Delivery charge must be exactly ₹50 for all orders
Maintain single-actor backend architecture in backend/main.mo
nonGoals: Online payment integration (credit card, UPI, wallets)
Multiple shipping options or variable delivery charges
User account creation or authentication for checkout

required: White and light blue wireless earbuds with transparent charging case showing digital display, product photography style on neutral background (wireless-earbuds-white-blue.dim_800x800.png)
